numlitem.para: Associated instruments operate from isolated sources, and
Inoperative switches are not moved in flight.
For ER operations, at least one FMC, EFI and IRS switch must be operative.
Ensure instruments are operating from isolated sources and inoperative switches are not moved during flight.

placard.para: Placard switch(es) located on Capt and F/O’s Instrument Source Select Switch panel "INOP – DO NOT MOVE" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
